description: Iris` Fraxure is the evolved form of Iris` Axew. It evolved into Iris` Haxorus sometime before the events of Iris and Ash Ketchum`s Pokémon World Tournament battle. It was briefly seen in a fantasy scene during the Pokémon World Tournament battle with Ash Ketchum. Iris` Axew had been shown to always want to evolve, as Iris` Fraxure appeared in a dream it had in BW 6.
name: Onondo (Iris)
